Uses of Interface
org.openhab.core.voice.STTEvent

  • Packages that use STTEvent 
    Package Description
    org.openhab.core.voice  

    • Uses of STTEvent in org.openhab.core.voice

      Classes in org.openhab.core.voice that implement STTEvent 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AudioStartEvent
      A STTEvent fired when the STTService starts hearing audio.
      class  AudioStopEvent
      A STTEvent fired when the STTService stops hearing audio.
      class  RecognitionStartEvent
      A STTEvent fired when the STTService starts recognition.
      class  RecognitionStopEvent
      A STTEvent fired when the STTService stops recognition.
      class  SpeechRecognitionErrorEvent
      A STTEvent fired when the STTService encounters an error.
      class  SpeechRecognitionEvent
      A STTEvent fired when the STTService recognizes speech.
      class  SpeechStartEvent
      A STTEvent fired when the STTService starts hearing speech.
      class  SpeechStopEvent
      A STTEvent fired when the STTService stops hearing speech.
      Methods in org.openhab.core.voice with parameters of type STTEvent 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void STTListener.sttEventReceived​(STTEvent sttEvent)
      Invoked when a STTEvent event occurs during speech recognition.
